attributes.action: We petition the government to clearly explain why the pound would be denied to an independent Scotland since many doubt its' sincerety.
attributes.additional_details:
"Better together should more aptly be "Far More Than The Sum Of The Parts" especially when applied to the economy/currency . Market confidence bases currency value upon the size,prestige, prospects and governance of the parent economy. Comparison of  currencies fixes their relative world value.
Government maintains the currency/economy through taxation,spending and borrowing (fiscal) controls.
Euro-club nations agree spending limits proportional to national income and if such a sterling relationship was applied to Scotland their spending would have to mirror N. Sea oil decline. Alternatively a shared currency beyond parental control would spell "Greek Tragedy"r for all but a few.

rejection.details: This E Petition has been declined due to the outcome of the Scotland Vote.
